text:
Six persons of Tamizhaga Vazhvurimai Katchi (TVK) were arrested here on Monday after they climbed a power substation tower at Sundar Nagar near Muthaiyapuram demanding withdrawal of a case filed against the party’s founder T. Velmurugan.

They claimed that the case filed by the Neyveli police recently was false. They remained atop for nearly an hour. After the police asked them to get down, they came down. They were released later.
title: TVK men arrested
